tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE game_server_data (
    server_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    server_name VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50),
    player_count INT,
    max_player_count INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)
CREATE TABLE matchmaking (    match_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    player_id UUID,    match_time TIMESTAMP,    match_result VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE game_sessions (    session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    player_id UUID,    session_start TIMESTAMP,    session_end TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE player_stats (    player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    wins INT DEFAULT 0,    losses INT DEFAULT 0,    games_played INT DEFAULT 0 );

CREATE TABLE matchmaking_sessions (
    session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    duration INT
);
